movie.title: Smartass
movie.description_intro: A 15 year old girl becomes intimately acquainted to a town in California after being released from prison.
movie.description_full: A 15 year old girl becomes intimately acquainted to a town in California after being released from prison.

movies.title: Free Rein: The Twelve Neighs of Christmas
movies.title_english: Free Rein: The Twelve Neighs of Christmas
movies.title_long: Free Rein: The Twelve Neighs of Christmas (2018)
movies.summary: While Bright Fields preps for its Mistletoe Ball, a broken ornament leads Zoe to a family secret, while Gaby finds herself at the mercy of new boss Mia.
movies.description_full: While Bright Fields preps for its Mistletoe Ball, a broken ornament leads Zoe to a family secret, while Gaby finds herself at the mercy of new boss Mia.
movies.synopsis: While Bright Fields preps for its Mistletoe Ball, a broken ornament leads Zoe to a family secret, while Gaby finds herself at the mercy of new boss Mia.

movies.title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer
movies.title_english: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer
movies.title_long: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer (1986)
movies.summary: Loosely based on serial killer Henry Lee Lucas, the film follows Henry and his roommate Otis who Henry introduces to murdering randomly selected people. The killing spree depicted in the film starts after Otis' sister Becky comes to stay with them. The people they kill are strangers and in one particularly gruesome attack, kill all three members of a family during a home invasion. Henry lacks compassion in everything he does and isn't the kind to leave behind witnesses - of any kind.

movies.title: The Substance: Albert Hofmann's LSD
movies.summary: In 1943, the year in which the first A-bomb was built, Albert Hofmann discovered LSD, a substance that was to become an A-bomb of the mind. Fractions of a milligram are enough to turn our framework of time and space upside down. The story of a drug - its discovery in the Basel chemistry lab, the first experiments by Albert Hofmann on himself, the 1950s experiments of the psychiatrists, the consciousness researchers, the artists. Could it actually be possible to find a path to the core of our human existence by means of a chemical? Spirituality at the flick of a switch? Do the enigmatic effects of this drug really help us to better understand the human soul? Could LSD be an instrument of contemporary psychiatry? Of modern brain research?

movies.title: A Charlie Brown Christmas
movies.summary: When Charlie Brown complains about the overwhelming materialism that he sees amongst everyone during the Christmas season, Lucy suggests that he become director of the school Christmas paegent. Charlie Brown accepts, but it proves to be a frustrating struggle. When an attempt to restore the proper spirit with a forlorn little fir Christmas tree fails, he needs Linus' help to learn what the real meaning of Christmas is.
